Text: **PLEASE NOTE** TO ALL THOSE WHO HAVE PM'D ME REGARDING THE JAPANESE GRAND PRIX. THE BBC COVERAGE HAD SUCH TECHINCAL PROBLEMS ON THE RACE DAY LIVE THAT IS CRASHED MY PVR AND I SADLY MISSED BEING ABLE TO RECORD IT.
thanks a lot for this coverage on here
